sentences.sContent: Each test should be run once to completion, one after another, without repetition of any test.
sentences.sCn: 每个测试都应该运行一次直到结束，一个接一个地运行， 不能重复运行任何测试。

sentences.sContent: Sometimes we would play games one after another.
sentences.sCn: 有时，我们会一个接一个地玩游戏。

sentences.sContent: The instances are deleted one after another in their own global transaction.
sentences.sCn: 实例在它们自己的全局事务中一个接一个地删除。

trans.tranOther: first one person or thing, and then another, and then another, up to any number or amount
